document.docAuthor: Breure, Abraham S. H. & Ablett, Jonathan D.
document.masterDocTitle: Annotated type catalogue of the Amphibulimidae (Mollusca, Gastropoda, Orthalicoidea) in the Natural History Museum, London

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Annotated type catalogue of the Amphibulimidae (Mollusca, Gastropoda, Orthalicoidea) in the Natural History Museum, London

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Netherlands Centre for Biodiversity Naturalis, P. O. Box 9517, Leiden, the Netherlands
Natural History Museum, Division of Higher Invertebrates, London, SW 7 5 BD, UK

figureCitation.captionText: Figure 29. Chileborus species. A-C, i Syntype of Bulimus elaeodes Pfeiffer, 1853 NHM 19991536 (H = 33.2).

subSubSection.paragraph: "Andes, N. Granada", taxon label in Pfeiffer's handwriting. M.C. label type I.
"Long. 36, diam. 18 mill."; figured specimen H 33.2, D 20.6, W 4.3.

These specimens are not accompanied by a label in Pfeiffer's handwriting and their measurements do not correspond with those published by Pfeiffer. They are treated here as possible syntypes but prove not to belong to the genus
Plekocheilus
to which this taxon was hitherto referred.
